name: PublishMutationReport
description: Use this task to upload your mutation test report to your build result.
author: Rouke Broersma

inputs.name: reportPattern
inputs.label: Path to mutation report. Supports wildards such as **/*.html
inputs.helpMarkDown: For help configuring your mutation test tool to output a html report see the tool's website. For [stryker see](https://stryker-mutator.io/)

inputs.name: reportDisplayName
inputs.label: Display name for the report tab. If you use multiple reports in a pipeline you can differentiate between them by setting the name.

inputs.name: useReportFileName
inputs.label: Set true if you want to use the report's name generated by Stryker
